oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Grand Ole Opry - Prince Albert - 1959-10-03 - Part 2
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Part 2 of Prince Albert tobacco sponsored Grand Ole Opry segment from October 3, 1959. Featuring Grant Turner (announcer), Faron Young (host/performer) with Donny Young, guest performers the Louvin Brothers, and regular performers Archie Campbell, Tommy Jackson, the Jordanaires Chet Atkins with Buddy Harman, Minnie Pearl, and Grandpa Jones. Held at Ryman Auditorium, Nashville, TN. It is announced that this is the 1043rd broadcast.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Minnie Pearl; Archie Campbell; Faron Young; Louvin Brothers; Grandpa Jones; Faron Young; Donny Young
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Faron Young introduces Minnie Pearl -- Comedy routine (Minnie Pearl, Archie Campbell) -- The Proof Is In The Puffing (Faron Young) (recording) -- Grant Turner introduces the Louvin Brothers -- While You're Cheating On Me (Louvin Brothers) -- Grant Turner introduces Grandpa Jones -- The Baldheaded End Of The Broom (Grandpa Jones) -- Grant Turner and Faron Young announce his tour schedule -- Country Girl (Faron Young, Donny Young) -- Closing theme -- Closing statement (Faron Young) -- Camel Cigarettes jingle -- Network announcements (Grant Turner)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WSM (Radio station : Nashville, Tenn.); National Broadcasting Company; Grand ole opry (Radio program); Ryman Auditorium (Nashville, Tenn.); United States. Armed Forces Radio Service; Turner, Grant; Sloan, Ralph; Tennessee Travelers; Campbell, Archie; Minnie Pearl; Atkins, Chet; Jones, Grandpa, 1913-1998; Jackson, Tommy; Jordanaires (Musical group); Harman, Buddy; Paycheck, Johnny; Young, Faron; Louvin Brothers; Louvin, Charlie, 1927-2011; Louvin, Ira, 1924-1965
